mapper.insert: insert into files ( files_no, menu_no, category_no, board_no, files_realname, files_fakename ) values ( seq_files_files_no.nextval, #{menuNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, (select max(board_no) from board), #{fileRealName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileFakeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into files ( files_no, menu_no, category_no, board_no, stop_no, files_realname, files_fakename ) values ( seq_files_files_no.nextval, #{menuNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{boardNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, (select max(stop_no) from stop), #{fileRealName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileFakeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select files_no, menu_no, category_no, board_no, files_realname, files_fakename from files where category_no = #{categoryNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} and board_no = #{boardNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} and stop_no = NULL

select files_no as fileNo, menu_no as menuNo, category_no as categoryNo, board_no as boardNo, files_realname as fileRealName, files_fakename as fileFakeName, stop_no as stopNo from files where stop_no = #{stopNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}
